description: This file contains utility functions for interacting with a code generation API, including functions for one-time generation and streaming generation with support for Server-Sent Events and fallback mechanisms.

methods.name: generateOnce(prompt, { signal } = {})
methods.description: Sends a POST request to the /api/generate endpoint with a prompt to obtain generated content once.

methods.name: streamGenerate(prompt, { onChunk, onDone, onError, usePost = false, signal } = {})
methods.description: Streams generated content from the backend via SSE or fetch stream, with support for progress updates and various event handlers.

ctags.name: streamGenerate
ctags.signature: (prompt, { onChunk, onDone, onError, usePost = false, signal } = {})
